author: jgm
content:
Any thoughts on adding a `client` field to the `status` message?  Format would be `product/major.minor.patch` e.g. ` prysm/1.2.3`.

Rationale behind this is there will inevitably be problems with some particular versions of particular clients, and at current there is no way of knowing if a peer is a problematic node or not.

Downside of this is we would be sending static data in `status`.  There could be a separate `hello` message that contains this information but that would be a larger change to the spec.
